name: Allegory (Rodwin)
description:
Allegory is a relaxing puzzle platformer that takes you on a musical journey. Visually, it fuses 2D hand-drawn animation with 3D environments to create a distinct visual style. Sit back and travel through this beautiful game as you attempt to piece together the meaning of the Allegory. 

Allegory was developed by three South African Game Developers (Rodwin Malinga, Daniel Hartwell and Erik Prinz).
